channel.title: Istextat error
channel.description: so yea ive been trying to run scripts, and make scripts with the istextat2 function and i get the error [code] [Error] (14460:1): Unknown identifier 'istextat2' in script [/code] if anyone can help that would be great. I also do have srl installed i put SetUpSRL; in the main loop and all that/

item.title: Istextat error
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

istextat2 doesn’t work anymore and isn’t in the latest versions of SCAR.

If you have SRL try reading Text.scar in Core folder for some text functions like:
IsUpText which is the top left text
FindText allows you to look anywhere for text
ClickOption lets you click things from the menu that appears when you right click

Read full topic

if anyone can help that would be great.
I also do have srl installed i put SetUpSRL; in the main loop and all that/
